replies.replyComment: Kiyapan machan ona dekata loke ona thanakata ekenma enawa. Ape rata ape jathiya ape agama ban . Godak un kiyanne api jathiwadiyo kiyala aththa ban api jathiwadiyo thamai papuwata danena kakkuma  danne api vitharai. Api rata jathiya agama rakinna gema ellanawa me gothayo karana wada walata mala paninawa ban .  Maragena marenna puluwan ban. Lankawe sinhala baudda api tharunayo thamai mewata gema ellanna ona wena kauruth na api abarenneth na . Kiyanna ona sin ekakata ekenma mama enawa. Kaalaya visadanakam enna kaalayak na dan . Ape un nagitinna kaale hari
@Lakruwan Jayakodi math kottawata Awith hama pansalak pansalak ganema awidha awidha hoyanne me pansala thamai

Ado ado ubath ape ekek ne .dakkagaman mol ban mewata.   Ube inbox ekata ne comed une sorry ban hamuduruwamta banina ekata ban mama tok kare. Ubata  emei ban. Mama essaraha agamata kalalak karana un marala erala danawa ban owa badisam denakam balan enna tharam mata ewasimak na ban . Sin eka dakka gaman mol ban mata.

Kauda hukanno raganne uba mona kariyek unath mata aulak na pako kauda uba ane hukahan.  Kari gothayo mewa media dana pakkunta pako mama tok karanne thrunada api bauddayo Pako gothayo nemei therunada.  Me hamuduruwanta banapu pakayata huththo mama kiyanne maranawa kariyawa . Agama pichan karala thambinta puka denawada kariyo. Me rata sinhala baudda mama  jathiya agama wenuwen maragena marenawa pako . Hamuduruwanta banapu pakaya moka unath mata wadak na do uba bauddayeknam hamuduruwanta banala media danawada huththo. Ai ubala muslim unta bayada api gema ellanne un ekka do ubala apema agamata garahana pakku ban. Ai ubata monada wenna ona kiyapan abarenna huththo mama.

Mokakda ponna kariyo thopi lokkoda hamuduruwanta kathakaranna ubata uganwanna onada. Waren pako rajaratata . Api pako agama wenuwen pana dena un  thopi mokunda gotha pakaya.  Media dala agama kanna epa pako . Uba hadiyan hamuduruwo hadanna kalin . Ape mas natanawa  pako mewa dakkama parissamata jiwath weyan gada kariya

comments.comment: Matanam penne hamuduruwo wate inna genu ekka sellama dapu seen ekak ekai me manussaya me widihata baninne, godak pansal wala me wage horu innawa hamuduruwo widihata, mewata godak hethuwa pansal walata salli lebena eka, mokada loku hamuduruwo thamai me salli araganne, denata siripade unath me inna hamuduruwo kiyana un business ekak karagena inne, wediyenma salli tiyna kena thamai eke pradaniya wenne, me salli denawata wada pansalata awashya dewal karala dunnanam ape agama thawa kalayak pawathiwi, nethnam me sasane kana un chiwaraya galawala dala pansalen elawanna oni
